pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:build/devices/evol_driver#evol_driver_mad_rogue)Evol Driver (Mad Rogue)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Resistance III$(li)Night Vision$(li)Jump Boost III$(li)Strength III$(li)Flying
